name: Snuko
overview:
Developers of comprehensive anti theft software for mobile devices and laptops / pc’s.

Snuko saw the requirement for anti-theft software and went about developing a comprehensive solution to help users protect their pc’s, laptops and smartphones. After intense development and testing Snuko released their full computer version and more recently their anti-theft for Android.

Snuko Anti Theft software is now seen as one of the leading solutions and has already received top reviews on some of the largest download websites. In addition successful antivirus software companies and computer / mobile phone distributors have already forged relationships and distribution agreements with Snuko.

The Snuko Laptop / PC Anti Theft solution offers some of the most advanced data security features such as a full online back up service, data encrytion, screenshot images of the desktop of reported stolen / lost devices, geo location tracking, WIFI auto connect, image capture of unauthorised user and computer lock down.

The Snuko Mobile Anti Theft also provides comprehensive features such as back up of call logs, SMS’s, application lists and contacts, encryption, geo location tracking using GPS, WIFI and cell tower triangulation and device lock down.

Snuko has launched its Android Anti Theft product on the Android Market and Getjar and has developed an IOS application to help users protect their PC’s, which is available from the Apple App Store and Getjar.

Snuko PLC (Wiener Borse: SNU) is the holding company of Snuko UK Ltd, a London based security-and IT company, specialising in securing computerâ€™s and mobile phones as well as crucial data from loss or theft. With operations in the US and Europe, Snuko is focusing on innovative security solutions that protect against loss and theft of internet enabled devices and data. Our customers are individual computer and mobile phone users, corporate enterprises, as well as third party software vendors. Our mission is to provide our users with the most effective, sophisticated and user friendly theft protection for computers and mobile phones, with the least amount of complexity, thus ensuring: Secured hardware, Secured software and data, reduced administration and business continuity despite loss of computer or mobile phone.
